member.name: T:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.CLikeFormat
member.summary: Provides a base class for formatting languages similar to C.

member.name: T:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.CodeFormat
member.summary: Provides a base class for formatting most programming languages.

member.name: T:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.SourceFormat
member.summary: Provides a base implementation for all code formatters.

remarks.para: To display the formatted code on your web site, the web page must refer to a stylesheet that defines the formatting for the different CSS classes generated by CSharpFormat: .csharpcode, pre, .rem, .kwrd, .str, .op, .preproc, .alt, .lnum.

Note that if you have multi-line comments in your source code (like /* ... */), the "line numbers" or "alternate line background" options will generate code that is not strictly HTML 4.01 compliant. The code will still look good with IE5+ or Mozilla 0.8+.

member.name: M:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.SourceFormat.FormatCode(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Transforms a source code stream to HTML 4.01.
member.returns: A string containing the HTML formatted code.

member.name: M:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.SourceFormat.FormatCode(System.String)
member.summary: Transforms a source code string to HTML 4.01.
member.returns: A string containing the HTML formatted code.

member.name: M:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.SourceFormat.FormatSubCode(System.String)
member.summary: Allows formatting a part of the code in a different language, for example a JavaScript block inside an HTML file.

member.name: M:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.SourceFormat.GetCssStream
member.summary: Gets the CSS stylesheet as a stream.
member.returns: A text of the CSS definitions.

member.name: M:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.SourceFormat.GetCssString
member.summary: Gets the CSS stylesheet as a string.
member.returns: A string containing the CSS definitions.

member.name: M:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.SourceFormat.MatchEval(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match)
member.summary: Called to evaluate the HTML fragment corresponding to each matching token in the code.
member.param: The resulting from a single regular expression match.
member.returns: A string containing the HTML code fragment.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.SourceFormat.TabSpaces
member.summary: Gets or sets the tabs width.
member.value: The number of space characters to substitute for tab characters. The default is 4, unless overridden is a derived class.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.SourceFormat.LineNumbers
member.summary: Enables or disables line numbers in output.
member.value: When true, line numbers are generated. The default is false.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.SourceFormat.Alternate
member.summary: Enables or disables alternating line background.
member.value: When true, lines background is alternated. The default is false.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.SourceFormat.EmbedStyleSheet
member.summary: Enables or disables the embedded CSS style sheet.
member.value: When true, the CSS <style> element is included in the HTML output. The default is false.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.SourceFormat.CodeRegex
member.summary: The regular expression used to capture language tokens.

member.name: M:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.CodeFormat.MatchEval(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match)
member.summary: Called to evaluate the HTML fragment corresponding to each matching token in the code.
member.param: The resulting from a single regular expression match.
member.returns: A string containing the HTML code fragment.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.CodeFormat.Keywords
member.summary: Must be overridden to provide a list of keywords defined in each language.
member.remarks: Keywords must be separated with spaces.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.CodeFormat.Preprocessors
member.summary: Can be overridden to provide a list of preprocessors defined in each language.
member.remarks: Preprocessors must be separated with spaces.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.CodeFormat.StringRegEx
member.summary: Must be overridden to provide a regular expression string to match strings literals.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.CodeFormat.CommentRegEx
member.summary: Must be overridden to provide a regular expression string to match comments.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.CodeFormat.CaseSensitive
member.summary: Determines if the language is case sensitive.
member.value: true if the language is case sensitive, false otherwise. The default is true.
member.remarks: A case-insensitive language formatter must override this property to return false.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.CLikeFormat.CommentRegEx
member.summary: Regular expression string to match single line and multi-line comments (// and /* */).

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.CLikeFormat.StringRegEx
member.summary: Regular expression string to match string and character literals.

member.name: T:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.PowershellFormat
member.summary: Generates color-coded HTML 4.01 from MSH (code name Monad) source code.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.PowershellFormat.CommentRegEx
member.summary: Regular expression string to match single line comments (#).

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.PowershellFormat.StringRegEx
member.summary: Regular expression string to match string and character literals.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.PowershellFormat.Keywords
member.summary: The list of MSH keywords.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.PowershellFormat.Preprocessors
member.summary: Use preprocessors property to hilight operators.

member.name: T:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.HtmlFormat
member.summary: Generates color-coded HTML 4.01 from HTML/XML/ASPX source code.

remarks.para: This implementation assumes that code inside <script> blocks is JavaScript, and code inside <% %> blocks is C#.
The default tab width is set to 2 characters in this class.

member.name: M:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.HtmlFormat.AttributeMatchEval(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match)
member.summary: Called to evaluate the HTML fragment corresponding to each attribute's name/value in the code.
member.param: The resulting from a single regular expression match.
member.returns: A string containing the HTML code fragment.

member.name: M:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.HtmlFormat.MatchEval(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match)
member.summary: Called to evaluate the HTML fragment corresponding to each matching token in the code.
member.param: The resulting from a single regular expression match.
member.returns: A string containing the HTML code fragment.

member.name: T:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.VisualBasicFormat
member.summary: Generates color-coded HTML 4.01 from Visual Basic source code.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.VisualBasicFormat.CaseSensitive
member.summary: Determines if the language is case sensitive.
member.value: Always true, since VB is not case sensitive.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.VisualBasicFormat.CommentRegEx
member.summary: Regular expression string to match comments (' and REM).

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.VisualBasicFormat.StringRegEx
member.summary: Regular expression string to match string and character literals.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.VisualBasicFormat.Keywords
member.summary: The list of VB keywords.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.VisualBasicFormat.Preprocessors
member.summary: The list of VB preprocessors.

member.name: T:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.JavaScriptFormat
member.summary: Generates color-coded HTML 4.01 from JavaSctript source code.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.JavaScriptFormat.Keywords
member.summary: The list of JavaScript keywords.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.JavaScriptFormat.Preprocessors
member.summary: Use the pre-processor color to mark directives that start with @.

member.name: T:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.TsqlFormat
member.summary: Generates color-coded T-SQL source code.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.TsqlFormat.CommentRegEx
member.summary: Regular expression string to match single line comments (--).

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.TsqlFormat.StringRegEx
member.summary: Regular expression string to match string literals.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.TsqlFormat.CaseSensitive
member.summary: Returns false, since T-SQL is not case sensitive.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.TsqlFormat.Keywords
member.summary: The list of T-SQL keywords.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.TsqlFormat.Preprocessors
member.summary: Use the pre-processor color to mark keywords that start with @@.

member.name: T:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.CSharpFormat
member.summary: Generates color-coded HTML 4.01 from C# source code.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.CSharpFormat.Keywords
member.summary: The list of C# keywords.

member.name: P:InsertCodePlugin.CSharpFormat.CSharpFormat.Preprocessors
